defaultItem.title: TinaCMS by the numbers
defaultItem.description: TinaCMS is an open-source content management system that allows developers to create and manage content for their websites and applications. It provides a flexible and customizable framework for building content-driven applications.

fields.label: Riverside Project ID
fields.name: riversideProjectId
fields.description: Optional: The project ID from Riverside API (used as 'projectId' query parameter in API v2 calls). Not required for podcasts hosted externally.

fields.label: Riverside Studio ID
fields.name: riversideStudioId
fields.description: Optional: Studio ID from Riverside (used as 'studioId' query parameter to filter recordings)

fields.description: Lower numbers appear first (0 = highest priority)
